snippet: The deaths bring to at least 24 the number of Tibetans who have set fire to themselves in western China since March 2011, and at least 16 of those have died.
abstract: Three Tibetans kill themselves after setting themselves on fire in two Tibetan regions of western China over the past three days to protest China's repression of Tibet.
lead_paragraph: The deaths bring to at least 24 the number of Tibetans who have set fire to themselves in western China since March 2011, and at least 16 of those have died.
